meanings.definition: A unit of distance equal to 1.609 kilometers.
meanings.sent1: I walked a kos to reach the market.
meanings.sent2: The sign said the next town was five kos away.
meanings.sent3: Trying to run a marathon without training is a real kos!
meanings.sent4: The kos between them seemed to stretch on forever.
meanings.sent5: The kos marker on the road made the journey seem longer.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a difficult or unpleasant situation.
meanings.sent1: Dealing with that project was a real kos.
meanings.sent2: She found herself in a kos when her car broke down in the middle of nowhere.
meanings.sent3: Getting stuck in traffic is always a kos!
meanings.sent4: The kos of organizing the event was overwhelming.
meanings.sent5: The kos of cleaning up after the party was exhausting.
